entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 1:36 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
